snippet: LaTroy Hawkins, 40, followed Marlon Byrd’s lead, becoming the latest Met to play well enough to price himself out of the team’s plans.
abstract: LaTroy Hawkins becomes the latest New York Met to play well enough to price himself out of the team’s plans; agrees to a one-year, $2.5 million contract with the Colorado Rockies, and will have a chance to be the team’s closer.
lead_paragraph: LaTroy Hawkins, 40, followed Marlon Byrd’s lead, becoming the latest Met to play well enough to price himself out of the team’s plans.
